title: In the ICU, doctors see rise in Covid cases but less severe disease
description: Who is hospitalized now with Covid? The elderly and people with weakened immune systems, doctors say. Cases aren't are severe as they were earlier in the pandemic.

title: Video shows murderer escape Pennsylvania prison by climbing between 2 walls
description: A convicted murderer stretched himself between a pair of parallel walls to escape from a Pennsylvania prison, newly released surveillance video showed on Wednesday.

title: She was a childfree woman enjoying her Saturday. Then came the culture warriors.
description: A short TikTok video about making eggs and watching TV turned into a flashpoint within the internet's larger culture war over women and societal expectations.

title: Kourtney Kardashian underwent 'urgent fetal surgery' to save her baby's life
description: Kourtney Kardashian spoke out Wednesday about undergoing "urgent fetal surgery" to save her unborn baby's life.

title: Cars are collecting data on par with Big Tech, watchdog report finds
description: An internet and privacy watchdog has a warning: Your car is tracking you, and it’s collecting far more information than it needs just to get you where you’re going.

title: Civil rights groups attacked by Elon Musk are mounting a counteroffensive
description: Anti-hate groups and civil rights organizations vowed this week to strengthen their resolve against hate speech on social media, saying they would not be intimidated by threats of lawsuits from tech billionaire Elon Musk.

title: YouTube's annual $2 billion 'Sunday Ticket' experiment kicks off this weekend
description: Jon Cruz still remembers the days when he had to convince the NFL and other sports leagues that there was value in uploading highlights to YouTube.

title: Special counsel David Weiss to seek indictment of Hunter Biden this month
description: WASHINGTON — The special counsel appointed to oversee the federal investigation into the president's son, Hunter Biden, intends to seek a grand jury indictment of the president’s son before the end of September, his office said Wednesday in a new filing.

title: FDA could greenlight new Covid boosters as early as Friday
description: When will new Covid boosters be available? The FDA could authorize the updated shots as early as Friday, according to sources familiar with the plans.

title: Eastern Band of Cherokee Indians may legalize recreational marijuana — a first in North Carolina
description: Members of the Eastern Band of Cherokee Indians will vote on the recreational use of marijuana on their reservation in western North Carolina.

title: Trader Joe's unconventional take on the Kimbap is selling out after going viral
description: Trader Joe’s sold out of kimbap, but it's inadvertently given Korean grocers increased visibility.

title: Trump is liable for defamation in second E. Jean Carroll case, judge rules
description: E. Jean Carroll has already proven that Donald Trump defamed her and her upcoming trial will focus solely on what damages he owes her, a judge has ruled.

title: Moderna says updated Covid vaccine works against the highly mutated BA.2.86 variant
description: Moderna’s latest Covid booster appears to work against the BA.2.86 omicron subvariant, the drugmaker said in a release Wednesday.

title: Russian missile kills 16 at Ukrainian market, in the deadliest attack in months
description: At least 16 people were killed when Russian forces shelled a market in the eastern Ukrainian city of Kostiantynivka, officials in the country said Wednesday.

title: Joe Jonas and Sophie Turner say they have 'mutually decided to amicably end' their marriage
description: Singer Joe Jonas and actor Sophie Turner released joint statements Wednesday announcing their split, one day after news broke that the pop star had filed for divorce.

title: Georgia judge to consider Trump co-defendants' requests to sever their cases
description: A Georgia judge will consider former Trump lawyers Sidney Powell and Kenneth Chesebro's requests to sever their cases from their co-defendants in the election interference probe.

title: Maine man served little jail time for abusing two women. Now a third says he 'almost killed' her.
description: One woman accused him of beating her so badly that her pelvic bone was broken, leaving her disabled.

title: Disney's wildest ride: Iger, Chapek and the making of an epic succession mess
description: After pushing back his retirement four times, Bob Iger finally made the leap.

title: E.U. targets Apple, Amazon, Alphabet, ByteDance, Meta, Microsoft in next phase of digital crackdown
description: The European Union is targeting Apple, Amazon, Microsoft, Google parent Alphabet, Facebook owner Meta and TikTok parent ByteDance under new digital rules aimed at reining in the market power of online companies.

title: Prosecutors in all 50 states urge Congress to strengthen tools to fight AI child sexual abuse images
description: Prosecutors in all 50 states are urging Congress to study how artificial intelligence can be used to exploit children through pornography.

title: Proud Boy gets record Jan. 6 sentence and Joe Jonas files for divorce from Sophie Turner: Morning Rundown
description: In today’s newsletter: Republicans are in the midst of an historic spending war for the presidential primary.

title: 3 men rescued after shark attacks damage their inflatable catamaran
description: Three sailors were rescued from a sinking inflatable catamaran on Wednesday after the "Russian Ocean Way" came under repeated attack by sharks off Australia.

title: GOP ad war hits $100 million as early-state campaign to stop Trump intensifies
description: The Republican presidential nominating fight just eclipsed $100 million in ad spending, as the GOP field burns money at a historic rate.

title: 'Price Is Right' host Bob Barker died of Alzheimer’s disease
description: Longtime “Price is Right” host Bob Barker died of Alzheimer’s disease, according to a death certificate viewed by NBC News.

title: All signs point to a rise in Covid
description: Covid cases, hospitalizations, and even deaths, are rising as fall approaches. What to know about the latest cases and variants.

title: Former White House aide wins crowded Democratic primary in Rhode Island special election
description: Gabe Amo touted his ties to Biden and defeated 10 other Democrats in a special election to fill a vacant congressional seat.
